item.title: [wai-aria-1.2] Content bug: ariaDescription specification table, incorrectly titled
item.content:encoded:
What page(s) did you find the problem on?

https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Element/ariaDescription

Specific page section or heading?

Specification table

What is the problem?

Specification table links out to ARIA 1.3, but the link text is 'Accessible Rich Internet Applications (WAI-ARIA) 1.2 (WAI-ARIA 1.2)'

There's no mention of aria-description attribute in the WAI ARIA 1.2 spec, I believe this is a 1.3 inclusion.

What did you expect to see?

a) The specification table should read

Accessible Rich Internet Applications (WAI-ARIA) 1.3 (WAI-ARIA 1.3)

b) or is completely dropped as per #2720

After a cursory review of the README and the repo, it wasn't immediately clear to me how to submit a fix for expected result a. Happy to create a PR for expected result b (or a if someone can clarify how to do this)

Thank you very much for your time üôè
